The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 10 July is 47,205 (5,463.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 July, there were 1,873 new confirmed cases (216.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 June, there were 975 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 92% (898 extra cases).
